description:
Head Captain Genryusai Yamamoto steps in to battle against the Reigai. Ichigo and Nozomi join Genryusai, each taking on the Reigai of captains Unohana, Ukitake, and Kyoraku.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Détruire Nozomi. La décision de Genryusai
Nozomi o Kesu!? Genryuusai no Ketsudan!
望実を消す!? 元柳斎(げんりゅうさい)の決断!
